state.description: Current state of email marketing consent.

state.description: Current state or status of the customer.

total_spent.description: Total amount spent by the customer.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the customer data was last updated.

note.description: Additional notes or comments related to the customer.

name.description: Full name associated with the address.

tags.description: Tags associated with the customer for categorization.
